knimeNode.name: Shape Appender
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends shapes to one selected column.

intro.p: Appends an existing shape model (ShapeHandler) to one selected column of the input table.

This may be useful if the column for which the shape model is defined gets lost somewhere in the workflow, is replaced by another column, or if there are two different datasets with the same class column.

fullDescription.option: Select the column to apply the shape model to. It might be the same column or a nominal column if the shape model was defined for nominal values.

ports.dataIn: Table to which shape settings should be applied to
ports.dataOut: Input table with shape information applied to one column
